data: MH Bipolar Disorder Medications (Module)
Medications
Consider baseline evaluation of renal and thyroid function prior to initiating treatment with lithium.
lithium carbonate
150 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: cap
300 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: cap
600 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: cap
900 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: cap
1,200 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: cap
1,500 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: cap
Consider baseline evaluation of liver function prior to initiating treatment with divalproex / valproic acid
divalproex EC
250 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: tab-EC
500 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: tab-EC
750 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: tab-EC

250 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: tab-EC
500 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: tab-EC
750 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: tab-EC
valproic acid
250 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: oral liq
500 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: oral liq
750 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: oral liq
valproic acid
250 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: oral liq
500 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: oral liq
750 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: oral liq
Consider baseline CBC, differential, evaluation of liver function, electrolytes and kidney function, and (in patients over 45 years old) ECG prior to initiating carbamazepine
carBAMazepine long acting
200 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: tab-long acting
400 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: tab-long acting
600 mg, PO, qAM, drug form: tab-long acting
carBAMazepine long acting
200 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: tab-long acting
400 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: tab-long acting
600 mg, PO, qHS, drug form: tab-long acting
Choose ONE of the following lamoTRIgine orders:

For patient taking medications that neither induce or inhibit lamoTRIgine glucuronidation. Initial: Weeks 1 and 2: lamotrigine 25 mg PO once daily; Weeks 3 and 4: 50 mg PO once daily; Week 5: 100 mg PO once daily; Week 6 and maintenance: 200 mg PO once daily
lamoTRIgine
25 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab

For patient taking medication that induce lamoTRIgine glucuronidation and not taking valproic acid. Initial: Weeks 1 and 2: 50 mg PO once daily; Weeks 3 and 4: 100 mg PO daily in divided doses; Week 5: 200 mg PO daily in divided doses; Maintenance: Up to 400 mg PO daily in divided doses
lamoTRIgine
50 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab

For patients taking valproic acid (regardless of any concomitant medication). Initial: Weeks 1 and 2: 12.5 mg PO daily; Weeks 3 and 4: 25 mg PO once daily; Week 5 and 6: 50 mg PO once daily; Maintenance: 100 mg once daily; May be increased to 200 mg PO daily if necessary
lamoTRIgine
12.5 mg, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab
